00116 BOOLEAN InitSlider()
00117 {
00118   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00119       
00120       // load Slider Box Graphic graphic and add it
00121       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00122       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\SliderBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00123       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSliderBoxImage ));
00124 
00125       gfSliderInited = TRUE;
00126 
00127       return( TRUE );
00128 }
00129 
00130 void ShutDownSlider()
00131 {
00132       SLIDER *pRemove = NULL;
00133       SLIDER *pTemp = NULL;
00134 
00135       AssertMsg( gfSliderInited, "Trying to ShutDown the Slider System when it was never inited");
00136 
00137       //Do a cehck to see if there are still active nodes
00138       pTemp = pSliderHead;
00139       while( pTemp )
00140       {
00141             pRemove = pTemp;
00142             pTemp = pTemp->pNext;
00143             RemoveSliderBar( pRemove->uiSliderID );
00144 
00145             //Report an error
00146       }
00147 
00148       //if so report an errror
00149       gfSliderInited = 0;
00150       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSliderBoxImage );
00151 }

00154 INT32 AddSlider( UINT8 ubStyle, UINT16 usCursor, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usNumberOfIncrements, INT8 sPriority, SLIDER_CHANGE_CALLBACK SliderChangeCallback, UINT32 uiFlags )
00155 {
00156       SLIDER *pTemp = NULL;
00157       SLIDER *pNewSlider = NULL;
00158       INT32       iNewID=0;
00159       UINT32      cnt=0;
00160       UINT16      usIncrementWidth=0;
00161 
00162       AssertMsg( gfSliderInited, "Trying to Add a Slider Bar when the Slider System was never inited");
00163 
00164       //checks
00165       if( ubStyle >= NUM_SLIDER_STYLES )
00166             return( -1 );
00167 
00168 
00169       pNewSlider = (SLIDER *) MemAlloc( sizeof( SLIDER ) );
00170       if( pNewSlider == NULL )
00171       {
00172             return( -1 );
00173       }
00174       memset( pNewSlider, 0, sizeof( SLIDER ) );
00175 
00176 
00177       //Assign the settings to the current slider
00178       pNewSlider->ubStyle = ubStyle;
00179       pNewSlider->usPosX = usPosX;
00180       pNewSlider->usPosY = usPosY;
00181 //    pNewSlider->usWidth = usWidth;
00182       pNewSlider->usNumberOfIncrements = usNumberOfIncrements;
00183       pNewSlider->SliderChangeCallback = SliderChangeCallback;
00184       pNewSlider->usCurrentIncrement = 0;
00185       pNewSlider->usBackGroundColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) );
00186       pNewSlider->uiFlags = uiFlags;
00187 
00188       //Get a new Identifier for the slider
00189       //Temp just increment for now
00190       pNewSlider->uiSliderID = guiCurrentSliderID;
00191 
00192       //increment counter
00193       guiCurrentSliderID++;
00194 
00195 
00196       //
00197       // Create the mouse regions for each increment in the slider
00198       //
00199       
00200       //add the region
00201       usPosX = pNewSlider->usPosX;
00202       usPosY = pNewSlider->usPosY;
00203 
00204       //Add the last one, the width will be whatever is left over
00205       switch( ubStyle )
00206       {
00207             case SLIDER_VERTICAL_STEEL:
00208 
00209                   pNewSlider->uiFlags |= SLIDER_VERTICAL;
00210                   pNewSlider->usWidth = STEEL_SLIDER_WIDTH;
00211                   pNewSlider->usHeight = usWidth;
00212                   pNewSlider->ubSliderWidth = STEEL_SLIDER_WIDTH;
00213                   pNewSlider->ubSliderHeight = STEEL_SLIDER_HEIGHT;
00214 
00215 
00216                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &pNewSlider->ScrollAreaMouseRegion, (UINT16)(usPosX-pNewSlider->usWidth/2), usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+pNewSlider->usWidth/2), (UINT16)(pNewSlider->usPosY+pNewSlider->usHeight), sPriority,
00217                                                        usCursor, SelectedSliderMovementCallBack, SelectedSliderButtonCallBack ); 
00218                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &pNewSlider->ScrollAreaMouseRegion, 1, pNewSlider->uiSliderID );
00219                   break;
00220                         
00221             case SLIDER_DEFAULT_STYLE:
00222             default:
00223 
00224                   pNewSlider->uiFlags |= SLIDER_HORIZONTAL;
00225                   pNewSlider->usWidth = usWidth;
00226                   pNewSlider->usHeight = DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE;
00227 
00228                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &pNewSlider->ScrollAreaMouseRegion, usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY-DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE), (UINT16)(pNewSlider->usPosX+pNewSlider->usWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE), sPriority,
00229                                                        usCursor, SelectedSliderMovementCallBack, SelectedSliderButtonCallBack ); 
00230                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &pNewSlider->ScrollAreaMouseRegion, 1, pNewSlider->uiSliderID );
00231             break;
00232       }
00233 
00234 
00235       //
00236       //    Load the graphic image for the slider box
00237       // 
00238 
00239       //add the slider into the list
00240       pTemp = pSliderHead;
00241 
00242 
00243       //if its the first time in
00244       if( pSliderHead == NULL )
00245       {
00246             pSliderHead = pNewSlider;
00247             pNewSlider->pNext = NULL;
00248       }
00249       else
00250       {
00251             while( pTemp->pNext != NULL )
00252             {
00253                   pTemp = pTemp->pNext;
00254             }
00255             
00256             pTemp->pNext = pNewSlider;
00257             pNewSlider->pPrev = pTemp;
00258             pNewSlider->pNext = NULL;
00259       }
00260 
00261       CalculateNewSliderBoxPosition( pNewSlider );
00262 
00263       return( pNewSlider->uiSliderID );
00264 }

00267 void RenderAllSliderBars()
00268 {
00269       SLIDER *pTemp = NULL;
00270 
00271       // set the currently selectd slider bar
00272       if( gfLeftButtonState && gpCurrentSlider != NULL )
00273       {
00274             UINT16 usPosY = 0;
00275 
00276             if( gusMouseYPos < gpCurrentSlider->usPosY )
00277                   usPosY = 0;
00278             else
00279                   usPosY = gusMouseYPos - gpCurrentSlider->usPosY;
00280 
00281             //if the mouse 
00282             CalculateNewSliderIncrement( gpCurrentSlider->uiSliderID,  usPosY );
00283       }
00284       else
00285       {
00286             gpCurrentSlider = NULL;
00287       }
00288 
00289 
00290 
00291       pTemp = pSliderHead;
00292 
00293       while( pTemp )
00294       {
00295             RenderSelectedSliderBar( pTemp );
00296 
00297             pTemp = pTemp->pNext;
00298       }
00299 }

00302 void RenderSelectedSliderBar( SLIDER *pSlider )
00303 {
00304 
00305 
00306       if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00307       {
00308       }                       
00309       else
00310       {
00311             //display the background ( the bar ) 
00312             OptDisplayLine( (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosX+1), (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosY-1), (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosX + pSlider->usWidth-1), (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosY-1), pSlider->usBackGroundColor );
00313             OptDisplayLine( pSlider->usPosX, pSlider->usPosY, (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosX + pSlider->usWidth), pSlider->usPosY, pSlider->usBackGroundColor );
00314             OptDisplayLine( (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosX+1), (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosY+1), (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosX + pSlider->usWidth-1), (UINT16)(pSlider->usPosY+1), pSlider->usBackGroundColor );
00315 
00316             //invalidate the area
00317             InvalidateRegion( pSlider->usPosX, pSlider->usPosY-2, pSlider->usPosX+pSlider->usWidth+1, pSlider->usPosY+2 );
00318       }
00319 
00320       RenderSliderBox( pSlider );
00321 }
00322 
00323 void RenderSliderBox( SLIDER *pSlider )
00324 {
00325   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00326       SGPRect           SrcRect;
00327       SGPRect           DestRect;
00328 
00329 
00330       if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00331       {
00332             //fill out the settings for the current dest and source rects
00333             SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
00334             SrcRect.iTop = 0;
00335             SrcRect.iRight = pSlider->ubSliderWidth;
00336             SrcRect.iBottom = pSlider->ubSliderHeight;
00337 
00338             DestRect.iLeft = pSlider->usPosX - pSlider->ubSliderWidth / 2;
00339             DestRect.iTop = pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition - pSlider->ubSliderHeight/2;
00340             DestRect.iRight = DestRect.iLeft + pSlider->ubSliderWidth;
00341             DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + pSlider->ubSliderHeight;
00342 
00343             
00344             //If it is not the first time to render the slider
00345             if( !( pSlider->LastRect.iLeft == 0 && pSlider->LastRect.iRight == 0 ) )
00346             {
00347                   //Restore the old rect
00348                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, (UINT16)pSlider->LastRect.iLeft, (UINT16)pSlider->LastRect.iTop, pSlider->ubSliderWidth, pSlider->ubSliderHeight );
00349 
00350                   //invalidate the old area
00351                   InvalidateRegion( pSlider->LastRect.iLeft, pSlider->LastRect.iTop, pSlider->LastRect.iRight, pSlider->LastRect.iBottom );
00352             }
00353 
00354             //Blit the new rect
00355             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)DestRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DestRect.iTop, pSlider->ubSliderWidth, pSlider->ubSliderHeight );
00356       }
00357       else
00358       {
00359             //fill out the settings for the current dest and source rects
00360             SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
00361             SrcRect.iTop = 0;
00362             SrcRect.iRight = pSlider->ubSliderWidth;
00363             SrcRect.iBottom = pSlider->ubSliderHeight;
00364 
00365             DestRect.iLeft = pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition;
00366             DestRect.iTop = pSlider->usPosY-DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE;
00367             DestRect.iRight = DestRect.iLeft + pSlider->ubSliderWidth;
00368             DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + pSlider->ubSliderHeight;
00369 
00370             //If it is not the first time to render the slider
00371             if( !( pSlider->LastRect.iLeft == 0 && pSlider->LastRect.iRight == 0 ) )
00372             {
00373                   //Restore the old rect
00374                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, (UINT16)pSlider->LastRect.iLeft, (UINT16)pSlider->LastRect.iTop, 8, 15 );
00375             }
00376 
00377             //save the new rect
00378             BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)DestRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DestRect.iTop, 8, 15 );
00379       }
00380 
00381 
00382       //Save the new rect location
00383       pSlider->LastRect = DestRect;
00384 
00385 
00386       if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00387       {
00388             //display the slider box
00389             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSliderBoxImage );
00390             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, pSlider->LastRect.iLeft, pSlider->LastRect.iTop, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00391 
00392             //invalidate the area
00393             InvalidateRegion( pSlider->LastRect.iLeft, pSlider->LastRect.iTop, pSlider->LastRect.iRight, pSlider->LastRect.iBottom );
00394       }
00395       else
00396       {
00397             //display the slider box
00398             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSliderBoxImage );
00399             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition, pSlider->usPosY-DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00400 
00401             //invalidate the area
00402             InvalidateRegion( pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition, pSlider->usPosY-DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE, pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition+9, pSlider->usPosY+DEFUALT_SLIDER_SIZE );
00403       }
00404 }

00406 
00407 void RemoveSliderBar( UINT32 uiSliderID )
00408 {
00409       SLIDER *pTemp = NULL;
00410       SLIDER *pNodeToRemove = NULL;
00411 //    UINT32      cnt;
00412 
00413       pTemp = pSliderHead;
00414 
00415       //Get the required slider
00416       while( pTemp && pTemp->uiSliderID != uiSliderID )
00417       {
00418             pTemp = pTemp->pNext;
00419       }
00420 
00421       //if we could not find the required slider
00422       if( pTemp == NULL )
00423       {
00424             //return an error
00425             return;
00426       }
00427 
00428       pNodeToRemove = pTemp;
00429 
00430       if( pTemp == pSliderHead )
00431             pSliderHead = pSliderHead->pNext;
00432 
00433       //Detach the node.
00434       if( pTemp->pNext )
00435             pTemp->pNext->pPrev = pTemp->pPrev;
00436 
00437       if( pTemp->pPrev )
00438             pTemp->pPrev->pNext = pTemp->pNext;
00439 
00440       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &pNodeToRemove->ScrollAreaMouseRegion );
00441 
00442       //if its the last node
00443       if( pNodeToRemove == pSliderHead )
00444             pSliderHead = NULL;
00445 
00446       //Remove the slider node
00447       MemFree( pNodeToRemove );
00448       pNodeToRemove = NULL;
00449 }
00450

00452 void SelectedSliderMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
00453 {
00454       UINT32      uiSelectedSlider;
00455       SLIDER *pSlider=NULL;
00456 
00457 
00458       //if we already have an anchored slider bar
00459       if( gpCurrentSlider != NULL )
00460             return;
00461 
00462       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00463       {
00464             pRegion->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00465 
00466             if( gfLeftButtonState )
00467             {
00468                   uiSelectedSlider = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
00469                   pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSelectedSlider );
00470                   if( pSlider == NULL )
00471                         return;
00472 
00473                   // set the currently selectd slider bar
00474                   if( gfLeftButtonState )
00475                   {
00476                         gpCurrentSlider = pSlider;
00477                   }
00478 
00479 
00480                   if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00481                   {
00482                         CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeYPos );
00483                   }                       
00484                   else
00485                   {
00486                         CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeXPos );
00487                   }
00488             }
00489       }
00490       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
00491       {
00492             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
00493 
00494             if( gfLeftButtonState )
00495             {
00496                   uiSelectedSlider = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
00497                   pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSelectedSlider );
00498                   if( pSlider == NULL )
00499                         return;
00500 
00501                   // set the currently selectd slider bar
00502 //                gpCurrentSlider = pSlider;
00503 
00504 
00505                   if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00506                   {
00507                         CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeYPos );
00508                   }                       
00509                   else
00510                   {
00511                         CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeXPos );
00512                   }
00513 
00514             }
00515       }
00516 
00517       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE )
00518       {
00519             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
00520 
00521             if( gfLeftButtonState )
00522             {
00523                   uiSelectedSlider = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
00524                   pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSelectedSlider );
00525                   if( pSlider == NULL )
00526                         return;
00527 
00528                   // set the currently selectd slider bar
00529 //                gpCurrentSlider = pSlider;
00530 
00531                   if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00532                   {
00533                         CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeYPos );
00534                   }                       
00535                   else
00536                   {
00537                         CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeXPos );
00538                   }
00539             }
00540       }
00541 }

00544 
00545 void SelectedSliderButtonCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00546 { 
00547       UINT32      uiSelectedSlider;
00548       SLIDER *pSlider=NULL;
00549 
00550       //if we already have an anchored slider bar
00551       if( gpCurrentSlider != NULL )
00552             return;
00553 
00554       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00555       {
00556       }
00557       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
00558       {
00559             uiSelectedSlider = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
00560 
00561             pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSelectedSlider );
00562             if( pSlider == NULL )
00563                   return;
00564 
00565 
00566 /*          // set the currently selectd slider bar
00567             if( gfLeftButtonState )
00568             {
00569                   gpCurrentSlider = pSlider;
00570             }
00571 */
00572 
00573             if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00574             {
00575                   CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeYPos );
00576             }                       
00577             else
00578             {
00579                   CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeXPos );
00580             }
00581       } 
00582       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
00583       {
00584             uiSelectedSlider = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 1 );
00585             
00586             pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSelectedSlider );
00587             if( pSlider == NULL )
00588                   return;
00589 
00590             // set the currently selectd slider bar
00591 /*          if( gfLeftButtonState )
00592             {
00593                   gpCurrentSlider = pSlider;
00594             }
00595 */
00596 
00597             if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00598             {
00599                   CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeYPos );
00600             }                       
00601             else
00602             {
00603                   CalculateNewSliderIncrement( uiSelectedSlider, pRegion->RelativeXPos );
00604             }
00605       }
00606 
00607       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00608       {
00609       } 
00610 }

00613 
00614 void CalculateNewSliderIncrement( UINT32 uiSliderID, UINT16 usPos )
00615 {
00616       FLOAT       dNewIncrement=0.0;
00617       SLIDER *pSlider;
00618       UINT16      usOldIncrement;
00619       BOOLEAN     fLastSpot=FALSE;
00620       BOOLEAN     fFirstSpot=FALSE;
00621 
00622       pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSliderID );
00623       if( pSlider == NULL )
00624             return;
00625 
00626       usOldIncrement = pSlider->usCurrentIncrement;
00627 
00628       if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00629       {
00630             if( usPos >= (UINT16)(pSlider->usHeight * (FLOAT).99 ) )
00631                   fLastSpot = TRUE;
00632 
00633             if( usPos <= (UINT16)(pSlider->usHeight * (FLOAT).01 ) )
00634                   fFirstSpot = TRUE;
00635 
00636             
00637             //pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements
00638             if( fFirstSpot )
00639                   dNewIncrement = 0;
00640             else if( fLastSpot )
00641                   dNewIncrement = pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements;
00642             else
00643                   dNewIncrement = ( usPos / (FLOAT)pSlider->usHeight ) * pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements;
00644       }
00645       else
00646       {
00647             dNewIncrement = ( usPos / (FLOAT)pSlider->usWidth ) * pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements;
00648       }
00649 
00650 
00651       pSlider->usCurrentIncrement = (UINT16)( dNewIncrement + .5 );
00652 
00653       CalculateNewSliderBoxPosition( pSlider );
00654 
00655 
00656       //if the the new value is different
00657       if( usOldIncrement != pSlider->usCurrentIncrement )
00658       {
00659             if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00660             {
00661                   //Call the call back for the slider
00662                   (*(pSlider->SliderChangeCallback) )( pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements - pSlider->usCurrentIncrement );
00663             }
00664             else
00665             {
00666                   //Call the call back for the slider
00667                   (*(pSlider->SliderChangeCallback) )( pSlider->usCurrentIncrement );
00668             }
00669       }
00670 
00671 }
00672 
00673 
00674 
00675 
00676 void OptDisplayLine( UINT16 usStartX, UINT16 usStartY, UINT16 EndX, UINT16 EndY, INT16 iColor )
00677 {
00678   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00679   UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00680 
00681       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
00682 
00683       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00684 
00685   // draw the line 
00686       LineDraw(FALSE, usStartX, usStartY, EndX, EndY, iColor, pDestBuf);
00687 
00688       // unlock frame buffer
00689       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00690 }
00691 
00692 
00693 void CalculateNewSliderBoxPosition( SLIDER *pSlider )
00694 {
00695       UINT16      usMaxPos;
00696 
00697       if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00698       {
00699             //if the box is in the last position
00700             if( pSlider->usCurrentIncrement >= ( pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements ) )
00701             {
00702                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = pSlider->usPosY + pSlider->usHeight;// - pSlider->ubSliderHeight / 2; // - minus box width
00703             }
00704 
00705             //else if the box is in the first position
00706             else if( pSlider->usCurrentIncrement == 0 )
00707             {
00708                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = pSlider->usPosY;// - pSlider->ubSliderHeight / 2;
00709             }
00710             else
00711             {
00712                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = pSlider->usPosY + (UINT16)( ( pSlider->usHeight / (FLOAT)pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements ) * pSlider->usCurrentIncrement );
00713             }
00714 
00715             usMaxPos = pSlider->usPosY + pSlider->usHeight;// - pSlider->ubSliderHeight//2 + 1;
00716 
00717             //if the box is past the edge, move it back
00718             if( pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition > usMaxPos )
00719                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = usMaxPos;
00720       }
00721       else
00722       {
00723             //if the box is in the last position
00724             if( pSlider->usCurrentIncrement == ( pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements ) )
00725             {
00726                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = pSlider->usPosX + pSlider->usWidth - 8 + 1;   // - minus box width
00727             }
00728             else
00729             {
00730                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = pSlider->usPosX + (UINT16)( ( pSlider->usWidth / (FLOAT)pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements ) * pSlider->usCurrentIncrement );
00731             }
00732             usMaxPos = pSlider->usPosX + pSlider->usWidth - 8+1;
00733 
00734             //if the box is past the edge, move it back
00735             if( pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition > usMaxPos )
00736                   pSlider->usCurrentSliderBoxPosition = usMaxPos;
00737       }
00738 }
00739 
00740 SLIDER *GetSliderFromID( UINT32 uiSliderID )
00741 {
00742       SLIDER *pTemp = NULL;
00743 
00744       pTemp = pSliderHead;
00745 
00746       //Get the required slider
00747       while( pTemp && pTemp->uiSliderID != uiSliderID )
00748       {
00749             pTemp = pTemp->pNext;
00750       }
00751 
00752       // if we couldnt find the right slider
00753       if( pTemp == NULL )
00754             return( NULL );
00755       
00756       return( pTemp );  
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void SetSliderValue( UINT32 uiSliderID, UINT32 uiNewValue )
00761 {
00762       SLIDER *pSlider = NULL;
00763 
00764       pSlider = GetSliderFromID( uiSliderID );
00765       if( pSlider == NULL )
00766             return;
00767 
00768       if( uiNewValue >= pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements )
00769             return;
00770 
00771       if( pSlider->uiFlags & SLIDER_VERTICAL )
00772             pSlider->usCurrentIncrement = pSlider->usNumberOfIncrements - (UINT16)uiNewValue;
00773       else
00774             pSlider->usCurrentIncrement = (UINT16)uiNewValue;
00775 
00776       CalculateNewSliderBoxPosition( pSlider );
00777 }
